theRanger:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theRanger:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theRanger:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theRanger:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theRanger:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theRanger:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theRanger:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theRanger:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theRanger:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theranger:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theRanger:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool HEY Number Card
theRanger:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theranger:M2! poison to an enemy.

theRanger:DirectShot.NAME: Direct Shot
theRanger:DirectShot.DESCRIPTION: theranger:Shot 1. NL Each deals !D! damage to the target
theRanger:DirectShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theranger:Shot 1. NL Each deals !D! damage and apply somevalue theranger:Infused to the target

theRanger:ShadowForm.NAME: Shadow Form
theRanger:ShadowForm.DESCRIPTION: You no longer lose theranger:Camouflage when Attack. NL Gain !M! theranger:Camouflage at start turn.

theRanger:Transcendence.NAME: Transcendence
theRanger:Transcendence.DESCRIPTION: At Start of your turn gain !M! theranger:Spirit.

theRanger:Overdraw.NAME: Overdraw
theRanger:Overdraw.DESCRIPTION: The first time you theranger:Shot each turn does not consume theranger:Essence. NL Draw 1 less card.

theRanger:Tenacity.NAME: Tenacity
theRanger:Tenacity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Vigor, gain !M! Block.

theRanger:Forest Aid.NAME: Forest Aid
theRanger:Forest Aid.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Will-o-Wisp to your Draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a *Will-o-Wisp, draw !M2! card.
theRanger:Forest Aid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Will-o-Wisp to your Draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a *Will-o-Wisp, draw !M2! cards.

theRanger:Sanctuary.NAME: Sanctuary
theRanger:Sanctuary.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain theranger:Camouflage, gain !M! theranger:Essence.

theRanger:Donation.NAME: Donation
theRanger:Donation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theranger:Density. NL At the start of your turn lose 1 theranger:Spirit.

theRanger:LeaveNoTrace.NAME: Leave No Trace
theRanger:LeaveNoTrace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain theranger:Camouflage, draw !M! card.
theRanger:LeaveNoTrace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain theranger:Camouflage, draw !M! card.

theRanger:Trap.NAME: Trap
theRanger:Trap.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you will lose HP from an enemy attack. NL theranger:Stealth: Next turn, Stun the enemy who triggered it.

theRanger:ExplosiveShot.NAME: Explosive Shot
theRanger:ExplosiveShot.DESCRIPTION: theranger:Shot 1. NL Deal !D! damage. Consume all the theranger:Infused of the enemy and deal that amount as damage to ALL enemies.

theRanger:Apollo'sFavor.NAME: Apollo's Favor
theRanger:Apollo'sFavor.DESCRIPTION: theranger:Shot 5. NL Next turn deal !D! + !M! times your theranger:Density. NL (Currently deals !M2!)

theRanger:Volley.NAME: Volley
theRanger:Volley.DESCRIPTION: theranger:Shot 1 3 times. NL Each deals !D! and applies !M! theranger:Infused to a random enemy.

theRanger:LightRain.NAME: Light Rain
theRanger:LightRain.DESCRIPTION: theranger:Shot 1 per each enemy. NL Deal !D! and apply !M! theranger:Infused to ALL enemies.

theRanger:SoulReap.NAME: Soul Reap
theRanger:SoulReap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain theranger:Essence equal to the unblocked damage.

theRanger:LastDitchEffort.NAME: Last Ditch Effort
theRanger:LastDitchEffort.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! theranger:True_Damage + !D! damage. NL Became theranger:Exposed. NL theranger:Empty_Handed: Deal !M2! extra theranger:True_Damage. NL Exhaust.

theRanger:CondensedShot.NAME: Condensed Shot
theRanger:CondensedShot.DESCRIPTION: theranger:Shot 1. NL Consume ALL theranger:Essence deal that amount multiplied by your theranger:Density as damage.

theRanger:ArrowHell.NAME: Arrow Hell
theRanger:ArrowHell.DESCRIPTION: theranger:Shot 1 until you run out of theranger:Essence. NL Each theranger:Shot deals !D! damage and applies !M! theranger:Infused to a random enemy.

theRanger:Snipe.NAME: Snipe
theRanger:Snipe.DESCRIPTION: theranger:Shot 1. NL Deal !D! damage. NL theranger:Stealth: Deal !M! extra damage

theRanger:UnseenStrike.NAME: Unseen Strike
theRanger:UnseenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your theranger:Camouflage.

theRanger:Retrieve.NAME: Retrieve
theRanger:Retrieve.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is theranger:Heavy_Wounded, gain 1 theranger:Kukri.

theRanger:PlannedAttack.NAME: Planned Attack
theRanger:PlannedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Skill played this turn.

theRanger:SoulThieve.NAME: Soul Thieve
theRanger:SoulThieve.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theranger:Empty_Handed: Gain !M! theranger:Essence.

theRanger:EssenceBlast.NAME: Essence Blast
theRanger:EssenceBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theranger:Overcharge: Return this from the discard pile to your hand.

theRanger:DryFire.NAME: Dry Fire
theRanger:DryFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.NL Whenever you run out of theranger:Essence, return this from the discard pile to your hand

theRanger:OutOfNowhere.NAME: Out Of Nowhere
theRanger:OutOfNowhere.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theranger:Stealth: Double the damage.

theRanger:BlindShot.NAME: Blind Shot
theRanger:BlindShot.DESCRIPTION: theranger:Shot 1. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! theranger:Infused to a random enemy.

theRanger:Bloodlust.NAME: Bloodlust
theRanger:Bloodlust.DESCRIPTION: Use ALL theranger:Kukris. NL Each deals !D! to a random enemy.

theRanger:Bloodbath.NAME: Bloodbath
theRanger:Bloodbath.DESCRIPTION: Use 1 theranger:Kukri. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theRanger:DriveBy.NAME: Drive By
theRanger:DriveBy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next !M! turns draw 1 more card.

theRanger:Bloodshed.NAME: Bloodshed
theRanger:Bloodshed.DESCRIPTION: Use 1 theranger:Kukri for each enemy. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theRanger:AntiAir.NAME: Anti Air
theRanger:AntiAir.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove Flight from the enemy.

theRanger:CrossUp.NAME: Cross-Up
theRanger:CrossUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theranger:Stealth: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

theRanger:RawPunch.NAME: RawPunch
theRanger:RawPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Get !M! Weak. NL theranger:Empty_Handed: Vigor affects this card !M2! times.

theRanger:HeavyRain.NAME: Heavy Rain
theRanger:HeavyRain.DESCRIPTION: theranger:Shot 3 for each enemy. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! theranger:Infused to ALL enemies.
